models.channels: Each channel represents one of the Core Four distribution methods (Warm Outreach, Cold Outreach, Content, Paid Ads) that operates autonomously to generate leads. Channels track their allocated budget, performance metrics like LTGP:CAC ratio, and current operational status.
models.leadGetters: Lead Getters are the four methods of leveraging others to get customers: Customer Referrals, Employees, Agencies, and Affiliates. These operate alongside the Core Four but are tracked separately with different metrics.
models.campaigns: Each campaign is a specific marketing initiative running within a channel. Campaigns have their own budgets, target audiences, and performance tracking that feeds back into the channel's aggregate metrics.
models.decisions: Decisions are autonomous choices made by the Strategy Brain, such as reallocating budget between channels, pausing underperformers, or scaling winners. Each decision includes the AI's reasoning and expected vs actual outcomes.
models.performanceHistory: Time-series data showing how key metrics have changed over the last 30 days. Used to render performance charts showing trends in LTGP:CAC ratio, spend, and lead volume.

relationships: Each Campaign belongs to a Channel (via channelId)
Each Decision affects one or more Channels (via affectedChannelIds)
Each Decision may affect specific Campaigns (via affectedCampaignIds)
Performance History tracks aggregate metrics across all Channels over time
Lead Getters operate independently but are displayed alongside Core Four Channels

channels.name: Warm Outreach
channels.description: Mining CRM for relationship scores and generating 3-way introductions

channels.name: Cold Outreach
channels.description: Personalized sequences at 1,000+/day with 4-step proven patterns

channels.name: Content
channels.description: 6 hook formulas, multi-platform posting, Give-Give-Give-Ask sequencing

leadGetters.name: Customer Referrals
leadGetters.description: 7 automated referral triggers targeting 25%+ monthly referral rate

leadGetters.name: Employees
leadGetters.description: Training systems with performance tracking and ROI per employee

leadGetters.name: Agencies
leadGetters.description: 6-month learning extraction to team training transition

campaigns.name: SaaS Founder Warm Intros
campaigns.targetAudience: Series A-B SaaS founders in network

campaigns.name: LinkedIn Thought Leadership
campaigns.targetAudience: B2B growth leaders, VPs and above

decisions.title: Shift $3K from Paid Ads to Content
decisions.reasoning: Content channel showing 12.4 LTGP:CAC (target: 5.0+) while Paid Ads declined to 2.8 (below 3.0 threshold). Content has capacity to scale with proven hook formulas showing consistent performance.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Increase Content channel leads by 40-50 while maintaining LTGP:CAC above 10.0

decisions.title: Pause Manufacturing Outreach Test
decisions.reasoning: Campaign 'Manufacturing Outreach Test' showing 2.8 LTGP:CAC after 4 days and 31 leads. Below 3.0 threshold with declining response rates (8% day 1, 3% day 4). Audience may require different messaging framework.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Prevent wasted spend on underperforming audience segment
decisions.actualResult: Paused after 3 days. Saved estimated $1,200 in additional spend.

decisions.title: Paid Ads Approaching Budget Limit
decisions.reasoning: Paid Ads channel at 94.5% budget utilization with 5 days remaining in period. Current burn rate ($3,780/day) will exceed allocated budget by Jan 10. LTGP:CAC below target suggests reducing spend rather than increasing allocation.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Flag constraint to human governance team for strategic decision on budget increase vs spend reduction
decisions.actualResult: Escalated to governance. Awaiting human decision on Q1 budget adjustment.

decisions.title: Optimize Cold Outreach Sequences
decisions.reasoning: Cold Outreach showing stable 5.8 LTGP:CAC with high volume (342 leads, 5 campaigns). Institutional memory identified 'Curiosity' hooks outperforming 'Proof' hooks by 23% in tech segment. Reallocating 30% more volume to curiosity-based sequences.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Increase Cold Outreach LTGP:CAC from 5.8 to 6.5+ by optimizing sequence hook patterns
decisions.actualResult: In progress. Early data shows 7.1 LTGP:CAC on optimized sequences (22% improvement).

decisions.title: Scale Warm Outreach - High LTGP:CAC
decisions.reasoning: Warm Outreach showing 8.2 LTGP:CAC (target: 5.0+) with only 52.5% budget utilization. Relationship mining identified 47 additional high-quality warm connections. Increasing budget allocation by $2,000 to capitalize on opportunity.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Generate 30-40 additional warm leads while maintaining LTGP:CAC above 7.0
decisions.actualResult: Budget increased. Generated 22 leads so far, maintaining 8.4 LTGP:CAC.

decisions.title: Test New Lead Magnet - Content Channel
decisions.reasoning: Content channel performing well (12.4 LTGP:CAC) but conversion rates plateauing at 14.1%. Institutional memory suggests 'Reveal Problem' lead magnets outperform 'Free Sample' in awareness-building content. Testing new assessment-style lead magnet.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Increase Content channel conversion rate from 14.1% to 17%+ with new lead magnet
decisions.actualResult: Test launched Jan 4. Awaiting 7-day minimum data collection period.

decisions.title: Reduce Paid Ads LinkedIn Campaign
decisions.reasoning: LinkedIn Ads campaign showing declining LTGP:CAC (started 4.2, now 3.2) with signs of audience fatigue (CTR dropped 31% over 7 days). Reducing daily budget by 40% while monitoring for stabilization.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Prevent LTGP:CAC from falling below 3.0 threshold by reducing spend on fatigued audience
decisions.actualResult: Budget reduced. LTGP:CAC stabilized at 3.2 over next 3 days.

decisions.title: Optimize Referral Trigger Timing
decisions.reasoning: Customer Referrals at 18.5% monthly rate (target: 25%+). Institutional memory shows referral requests at 90-day milestone outperform 30-day by 64%. Shifting all automated triggers to 90+ day customer milestone.
decisions.expectedOutcome: Increase monthly referral rate from 18.5% to 24%+ by optimizing trigger timing
decisions.actualResult: Timing optimized. Monitoring for 30-day measurement period.
